Essor French Star Share Share to Select all Delete Favorite words History words Search Meaning Parameters Confirmation Cancel Yes Copying dictionary data… Delete selected record(s)? TTS (text to speech) data missed, install now? About Library - French-Chinese, Chinese-French and conjugation

Search - input English characters, no need accent

Conjugation - search conjugation by adding a space plus \"@C\" after input

Meaning - in meaning menu, French is highlighted by default, you can select word by clicking

Any suggestion, please contact us by essorfrench@gmail.com 音标 No history No history to clear No favorite to clear No favorite word Clear all histories? Clear all favorite words? Clear all histories, if you want to clear some of them, please long press list item Clear all favorite words, if you want to clear some of them, please long press list item Theme Grey Indigo Green Purple Blue grey Cyan [voice] Night mode Highlight french [a-zA-Zçéâêîôûàèùëïüεaəøœɔãɑ̃ɛ̃œ̃ɔ̃∫ʒɲɥ~\']+> Line space Standard Font size Small Normal Big Huge Visit Google Play Support voluntarily This dictionary is free to be used by anybody. In order to improve it better in the future, you can donate by scanning following Alipay QR code to support the author. Your name will appear in \"donors list\" of next version. It\'s voluntary.
